titles: A letter to Anonymus in answer to his Three letters to Dr. Sherlock about church-communion
author: Sherlock, William, 1641?-1707.
notes: Written by William Sherlock.  Cf. DNB.
Anonymous is identified as William Atwood.  Cf. Clark Memorial Lib. dict. cat.
This work is also appears on reels 1514:13 and 528:1 (as the third item in v. 1 of: A collection of cases and other discourses (Wing C5114)).
Reproduction of originals in the Duke University Library, Harvard University Library and Bristol Public Library, Bristol, England.
keywords: Atwood, William, d. 1705? --  Three letters to Dr. Sherlock concerning church-communion.
Lord's Supper --  Church of England --  Early works to 1800.
